src:
Man of the Match Vitoria Guimares vs Arsenal: Shkodran Mustafi
07 Nov 2019, 01:56 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Arsenal gagal menuai poin penuh saat melawat ke markas Vitoria Guimares dalam laga lanjutan Liga Europa, Rabu (6/11/2019). Skuat besutan Unai Emery tersebut harus pasrah menerima hasil imbang dengan skor 1-1.
Kedua tim sama-sama kesulitan untuk mencetak gol hingga menjelang pertandingan berakhir. Arsenal sempat unggul lebih dulu setelah sang bek, Shkodran Mustafi, berhasil menggetarkan jala gawang Vitoria dengan sundulannya di menit ke-80.
Keunggulan tersebut tak bertahan lama. Pada masa injury time, Vitoria sukses mencetak gol balasan melalui tendangan salto Bruno Duerte yang memanfaatkan kelengahan pertahanan the Gunners.
Meski hanya mendulang satu poin, namun Arsenal hampir dipastikan telah mendapatkan tiket ke babak berikutnya. Mereka kini menempati puncak klasemen dengan raihan 10 angka dan bakalan dipastikan lolos andai Standard Liege kalah atas Eintracht Frankfurt.

Scroll ke bawah untuk membaca informasi selengkapnya.
text:
Man of the Match Vitoria Guimares v Arsenal: Shkodran Mustafi
Nov 7 2019, 01:56 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Arsenal failed to reap full points when a visit to the headquarters of Vitoria Guimares in the Europa League continued match, Wednesday (11/06/2019). Unai Emery's squad must resign themselves to accept a draw with a score of 1-1.
Both teams are equally difficult to score until the end of the game. Arsenal had superior first after the defender, Shkodran Mustafi, managed to vibrate the net Vitoria with a header in the 80th minute.
These advantages do not last long. During injury time, Vitoria successfully scored a goal back through Bruno Duerte's overhead kick that took advantage of the Gunners' defense.
Although only gain one point, but Arsenal are almost certain to get a ticket to the next round. They now top the standings with 10 points and will certainly pass if Standard Liege loses to Eintracht Frankfurt.
